49 // This macro is used in DLL builds. If it has not
50 // been set in babelconfig.h, define it as nothing.
51 #ifndef OBCOMMON
52  #define OBCOMMON
53 #endif
54 
69 
71 class OBCOMMON OBMoleculeFormat : public OBFormat
72 {
73 public:
74 
75  OBMoleculeFormat()
76  {
77  if(!OptionsRegistered)
78  {
79  OptionsRegistered=true;
80  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("b", this, 0, OBConversion::INOPTIONS);
81  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("s", this, 0, OBConversion::INOPTIONS);
82  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("title", this, 1, OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
83  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("addtotitle",this, 1, OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
84  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("property", this, 2, OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
85  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("C", this, 0, OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
86  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("j", this, 0, OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
87  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("join", this, 0, OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
88  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("separate", this, 0, OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
89 
90  //The follow are OBMol options, which should not be in OBConversion.
91  //But here isn't entirely appropriate either, since one could have
92  //OBMol formats loaded but which don't derived from this class.
93  //However, this possibility is remote.
94  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("s", NULL, 1,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
95  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("v", NULL, 1,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
96  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("h", NULL, 0,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
97  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("d", NULL, 0,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
98  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("b", NULL, 0,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
99  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("c", NULL, 0,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
100  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("p", NULL, 1,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
101  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("t", NULL, 0,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
102  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("k", NULL, 0,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
103  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("filter", NULL, 1,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
104  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("add", NULL, 1,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
105  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("delete", NULL, 1,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
106  OBConversion::RegisterOptionParam("append", NULL, 1,OBConversion::GENOPTIONS);
107  }
108  }
109 
111  static bool ReadChemObjectImpl(OBConversion* pConv, OBFormat*);
113  static bool WriteChemObjectImpl(OBConversion* pConv, OBFormat*);
114 
116  virtual bool ReadChemObject(OBConversion* pConv)
117  { return ReadChemObjectImpl(pConv, this);}
118 
120  virtual bool WriteChemObject(OBConversion* pConv)
121  { return WriteChemObjectImpl(pConv, this);}

128  static bool DeferMolOutput(OBMol* pmol, OBConversion* pConv, OBFormat* pF);
132  static bool OutputDeferredMols(OBConversion* pConv);
134  static bool DeleteDeferredMols();
136  static OBMol* MakeCombinedMolecule(OBMol* pFirst, OBMol* pSecond);
138 
139 #ifdef HAVE_SHARED_POINTER
140  static bool OutputMolsFromReaction
142  (OBReaction* pReact, OBConversion* pConv, OBFormat* pFormat);
143 #endif
144 
145 #ifdef _MSC_VER
146  typedef std::tr1::unordered_map<std::string, unsigned> NameIndexType;
147 #elif defined(_LIBCPP_VERSION)
148  typedef std::unordered_map<std::string, unsigned> NameIndexType;
149 #elif (__GNUC__ == 4 && __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 1 && !defined(__APPLE_CC__)) || defined (USE_BOOST)
150  typedef std::tr1::unordered_map<std::string, unsigned> NameIndexType;
151 #else
152  typedef std::map<std::string, unsigned> NameIndexType;
153 #endif
154 
155  // documentation in obmolecformat.cpp
156  static bool ReadNameIndex(NameIndexType& index, const std::string& datafilename,
157  OBFormat* pInFormat);
158 
160  const std::type_info& GetType()
161  {
162  return typeid(OBMol*);
163  }
164 
165 private:
166 
167  static bool OptionsRegistered;
168  static std::map<std::string, OBMol*> IMols;
169  static OBMol* _jmol;
170  static std::vector<OBMol> MolArray;
171  static bool StoredMolsReady;
172  static OBDescriptor* _pDesc;
173 
174 };
